Title: Trials
Plot: After a young boy, Christopher Ryan, is caught driving a runaway van, Detective Elliot Stabler and Detective Benson take the seven year-old into questioning. When Christopher claims his foster parents, Gwen and Noah Sibert, bribe him in exchange for abusive medical testing, the detectives investigate his allegations.
ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence, sexual themes and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Jae Head, Julie Bowen, Luke Perry, Sara Gilbert
